attributes.action: insure that packaging companys and super markets use 50% more compostable packaging by 2012 and it be in full use by 2015.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition will go a long way to solving our waste plastic/paper concerns,ther are british companys ready and willing to supply the trade with ready made solutions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
